DOC.brief_summary: An open clinical trial study immune response safety give booster dose ( 5th Dose ) combination vaccine Diphteria-Tetanus-Pertussis-Polio healthy adolescent 15-16 Years age . The first three dos give first year life , accord Norwegian child immunization program . The fourth dose give previous clinical trial perform 1998 child 6-7 year old . In 2006 change child immunization program Norway : fourth dose Combination Vaccine Against Diphteria-Tetanus-Pertussis-Polio give child 6-7 year old . This study give u information need additional dose ( 5th dose ) combination vaccine , contain pertussis component , adolescent leave secondary school .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Study Booster Dose ( 5th ) Diphteria-Tetanus-Pertussis-Polio Vaccine
DOC.criteria: Healthy adolescent previously receive dose vaccine diphteria , tetanus , pertussis polio clinical trial 1998 Written inform consent adolescent one his/her parent The family must understand norwegian Serious chronic disease Vaccination tetanus last 12 month Immunization Diphteria vaccine component study 1998 Suspected confirm immune deficiency Immunological/immunosuppressive treatment Pregnancy Serious reaction previous immunization vaccine component Acute fever ( axillary temperature ≥ 38°C ) vaccination . ( Postpone vaccination )
